plot: Frank surprises his sister Tina with her boyfriend Heiko in bed. His moral sermon bounces off the girl. She only replies that she is old enough to take care of herself. Heiko no longer understands the world when Tina repeats that there is an end between them. Elke Opitz wants to resign from Lilo Gottschick. The head of the agency hypocritically responds to Elke's wishes, but insists that the 14-day notice period is observed. Clemens bought shares to allow Vera and Heiko to keep the house.
